PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-02242014-03-06,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of TROY MYERS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of TROY MYERS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21 to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
